name: Snooze To Death
description:
This is a Local multiplayer game where you try to stamp on each others head!
You are both going to die in 60 seconds but if you hit each others head 2 seconds extra will go down. 

Jump on each other and the last man standing wins. 
Player 1  ; W - jump  | A - left | D - right
Player 2 : UpArrow - jump | Left Arrow - left | Right Arrow - Right
